name: GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration
description:
GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration

Product description

FLEXX EAAs delivers all 9 Essential Amino Acids (EAAs) for complete muscle protein synthesis. The result: Muscle preservation, energy, enhanced endurance, and recovery. This total amino acid profile features 7g of EAAs, with 5g in the clinically preferred 2:1:1 ratio. For stress mitigation and improved vitality, it includes 125mg of the adaptogenic herb Sensoril Ashwagandha. Our amazing flavors provide hydration support that’s truly delicious, anytime: Pre, Intra, and Post-Workout. For the hard training athlete, FLEXX EAAs is the complete muscle and recovery solution.
short_description:
GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration

  • Essential Aminos – Each serving of Flexx EAAs contains 7g of Essential Amino Acids to help promote muscle protein synthesis
  • Adaptogen Driven Vitality Support – Flexx EAAs provides 125mg of Ashwagandha to help promote better Cortisol support
  • Enhanced Recovery – In addition to EAAs, each serving is packed with 5g of Branched Chain Amino Acids to support better recovery
  • Balanced Hydration – Coconut water provides a balanced mixture of minerals and electrolytes to support optimal hydration levels
  • Endurance Fuel – Flexx EAAs are perfect for any activity from weight lifting to hiking, bicycling and anything in between

name: RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 Powder Post Workout and Muscle Recovery - 30 Servings
description:
RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 , Lean Muscle Recovery - 30 Servings

Enhance Muscle Growth
BCAA supplementation paired with resistance training can lead to increased muscle protein synthesis and muscle growth.

Speed Up Recovery & Muscle Repair
BCAAs can reduce the breakdown of protein and muscle damage during exercise, thus protecting against muscle loss, decreasing soreness and speeding up muscle recovery.

Improve Athletic Performance
Supplementing with BCAAs as part of a resistance training program can result ion significant improvements in strength and performance.

Suggested Use

As a dietary supplement, take 1 scoop of BCAA 5000 Powder into 8-10 oz cold water, between meals, 30-45 minutes before workouts, and/or immediately after workouts. Consume 1 serving, 1-3 times daily.

Other Ingredients

Citric acid, maltodextrin, natural and artificial flavors, silica, sucralose, malic acid, acesulfame potassium, FD&C yellow #5, FD&C red #40.
short_description:
RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 , Lean Muscle Recovery – 225 gms

  • Clean Active Nutrition
  • 5g Instantized BCAA
  • lean Muscle Growth
  • Athletic Performance
  • Recovery

  • 30 Total Servings

name: RSP Nutrition AminoLean, Pre Workout Amino Energy, Fat Burner - 30 Servings
description:
RSP Nutrition AminoLean, Pre Workout Amino Energy, Fat Burner - 30 Servings

  • Clean Active Nutrition
  • 5 g Essential Amino Acids
  • Weight Management
  • Mental Focus
  • Natural & Artificial Flavors
  • Zero Calories
  • Zero Sugar
  • 30 Total Servings
  • Third-Party Tested
  • Dietary Supplement
  • CarnoSyn® Carnosine Synthesize
  • InnovaTea®

RSP was born to help people achieve their health and fitness goals. We live to partner with you in achieving those goals. Whether you're a busy professional trying out a new fitness program or a lifelong athlete, we know this can be challenging. Our mission is to create nutritional products that make your journey both heathy and enjoyable, without ever asking you to choose between quality and convenience. So set a goal, fuel up, beat a personal best, recover and repeat. We have your back every step of the way.

Anytime Energy & Performance
125 mg natural caffeine from fermented tea leaves to support energy levels, focus and alertness.

Essential Amino Acids for Muscle Recovery
Comprehensive blend of essential amino acids to boost performance and support muscle development & repair.

Weight Management Support
CLA, Carnitine, Green Tea Extract and Green Coffee Extract promote weight management.

Suggested Use

Mix 2 scoops (1 serving) of AminoLean® in 8-10 oz of cold water anytime throughout the day.

Recommended Use:

For Anytime Energy & EAA's: Take 1 or more servings first thing in the morning and/or between meals.

For Pre-Workout & EAA's: Take 1-3 servings 20-30 minutes before training.

For Recovery & EAA's: Take 1-2 serving after training and/or between meals.

Do not exceed more than 6 scoops (3 servings) in a 4 hour period and do not exceed more than 8 scoops (4 servings) in a 24 hour period.

Other Ingredients

Citric acid, natural & artificial flavors, maltodextrin, sucralose, fiber blend (cellulose gum, xanthan gum, carrageenan), acesulfame potassium, FD&C red #40, FD&C blue #1
short_description:
RSP Nutrition AminoLean, Pre Workout

  • Essential amino acids to support lean muscle recovery
  • Bcaas to help build lean muscle
  • L-carnitine to increase metabolism and convert fat into energy
  • Provides anytime energy
  • Promotes weight management and fat burning
  • 0 Calories, 0 Sugars, 0 Carbohydrates

name: RSP Nutrition Glutamine Powder - 250 grams
description:
RSP Nutrition Glutamine, Pure Micronized Glutamine Powder for Recovery - 250 grams

  • LEAN MUSCLE AND OVERALL HEALTH - L-Glutamine is an essential amino acid that plays a crucial role in supporting lean muscle as well as supporting a variety of functions in the body such as digestion and the immune system.
  • MICRONIZED FOR ABSORPTION - RSP Nutrition L-Glutamine is micronized for maximal absorption and mixes effortlessly into your favorite beverage.
  • GLUTAN, GMO, AND BANNED SUBSTANCE FREE - Rest easy knowing that RSP Nutrition L-Glutamine is free of gluten, GMOs and banned substances.
  • Increase endurance

RSP was born to help people achieve their health and fitness goals. We live to partner with you in achieving those goals. Whether you're a busy professional trying out a new fitness program or a lifelong athlete, we know this can be challenging. Our mission is to create nutritional products that make your journey both healthy and enjoyable, without ever asking you to choose between quality and convenience. So set a goal, fuel up, beat a personal best, recover and repeat. We have your back every step of the way.

Lean muscle & overall health: The essential amino acid, L-Glutamine, plays a critical role in supporting lean muscle, as well as certain functions in the body such as digestion and the immune system.

100% pure glutamine: Each serving contains 5 g of premium micronized glutamine-no fillers-just the best quality glutamine. 

Suggested Use

Take one serving (1 scoop) mixed with 8-10 fl.oz of cold water (or other beverage of your choice) before, during or after training. On non-training days, take one serving (1 scoop) in the morning. Easily mixed and stacked with other products.

name: Cellucor C4 Ultimate - (Icy Blue Razz) - 400 grams
description:
Cellucor C4 Ultimate - (Icy Blue Razz) - 400 grams

  • #1 America's Best-Selling Pre-Workout Brand
  • Naturally Flavored
  • Dietary Supplement
  • TeaCrine
  • AlphaSize
  • Con-Cret Reinforced
  • CarnoSyn - Carnosine Synthesizer
  • NO3-T Nitrate Technology

Project Clear Evolution™

  • Clean - No Artificial Dyes. No Artificial Flavors
  • Clear - Fully Transparent Label. No Proprietary Blends
  • Evolved - Innovative Ingredients. Enhanced Formulas

C4 Ultimate Performance ID

  • 6 g Super Citrulline Pump Matrix - Powered by Nitramax (NO3-C)™
  • 3.2 g Carnosyn Beta-Alanine - Muscular Endurance
  • 2 Patented Creatines
  • 300 mg Caffeine - Explosive Energy

Suggested Use

Take one serving (approx. 1 level scoop) of C4 Ultimate®, mixed with 12 fl. oz. of water (adjust for taste preference) 20-30 minutes before training. Some individuals may experience a harmless tingling sensation, which is attributable to Beta-Alanine. Use only as directed.

Other Ingredients

Calcium silicate, silicon dioxide, natural flavors, acesulfame potassium, sucralose, citric acid, spirulina extract (color).
short_description:
Cellucor C4 Ultimate (Icy Blue Razz), 400 grams

  • Contains carnosyn beta alanine,  an amino acid, which converts to a compound in your body called carnosine
  • The ultimate formula 6g citrulline malate, 3. 2G beta alanine, 1. 5G creatine nitrate, 1g arginine, 858mg nootropic energy blend, 300mg caffeine per scoop, 20 servings per contain

name: My Protein-100% L-Leucine Powder 250 gm
description:
My Protein-100% L-Leucine Powder 250 gm

One of the most popular amino acids, L-leucine makes up one-third of the well-known branched chain amino acids – BCAAs.

This can’t be produced by your body so it must come from your diet, and that’s where we come in.

Our Vegan L-Leucine is sourced from plant-based ingredients, using a microbial fermentation process, making it perfect for vegetarian and vegan diets!

What are the benefits of Vegan L-Leucine?

It’s one of the popular amino acids in a convenient supplement. These are the building blocks of protein, which make up the structure of new muscle tissue – so important for any fitness goal, whatever your aim.
short_description:
My Protein-100% L-Leucine Powder

description:
MHP XPEL, 80 Tablets

A proprietary method called integrated enzyme technology (Eet) has been used for this groundbreaking fresh protein.
- This fresh technique works within a phospholipid matrix which produces leucine and other amino acids at an early stage during protein development.
- During other techniques, EET is designed to release leucine peptides selectively, causing an improvement in muscle synthesization and development.
- An herbal diuretic is all-natural, gives water loss and helps males and females. MHP Xpel Maximum strength. Xpel is a strong herbal diuretic intended to assist the body dramatically remove surplus fluid from the skin.
- This recipe also provides the correct equilibrium of the essential electrolytes that contribute to the maintenance of body efficiency and body completeness.
Benefits: 
 
  • MHP Xpel helps with the surplus water removal process.
  • It also Keeps a normal balance of body fluid.
  • Weight Loss Supplement: Improve a program of weight loss.
  • Maintain Muscle Mass: It encourages a slim muscular appearance.
  • MHP Xpel may reduce the retention of water.
  • Fat Burner: Decreases bloating and further fat loss
Directions for use: 

        - Drink at least 6 to 8 water cups a day, not exceed the suggested dose.
        - Take 4 capsules of MHP Xpel twice daily – once in the morning and once in the evening.
Ingredients: Gelatin, Cellulose, Magnesium Stearate, and Silica.
Note: Keep out of reach of children.

MHP XPEL, 80 Tablets

MHP Xpel is an unique formula that works rapidly to reduce bloating and support weight management, making it the perfect supplement for special occasions.

name: Universal Nutrition, Animal Pak, Training Packs, 44 Packs
description:
Universal Nutrition, Animal Pak, Training Packs, 44 Packs

Animal Pak® For three decades and counting, Animal Pak has been the time-tested choice for uncompromising strength athletes all over the world. A complete all-in-one training pack specifically designed for the strongest lifters and toughest athletes, Animal Pak provides the nutritional "insurance" to help you get through every set, every rep, every time.

Ironclad Guarantee Animal is dedicated to being the best in the business, no two ways about it. If this product doesn't meet with your tough requirements for any reason, let us know. When it comes to standing behind our products, we don't mess around. That's the truth.

Suggested Use

Dosage: Take 1 to 2 packs with breakfast or any other meal, with plenty of water. For those who compete or are training with higher intensity, two packs is suggested.

name: Animal Spiked Aminos 210 gms
description:
Animal Spiked Aminos 210 gms

Aminos today are like what creatine was when it first hit the market. Today, both are proven staples in the arsenals of all serious, dedicated weightlifters who are looking to make gains day in and day out. Animal’s newest product, Spiked Aminos, uses the highest quality free form and instantized BCAAs and EAAs. This perfectly balanced ratio of aminos are more readily absorbed and utilized than regular, conventional aminos. You can use Animal Spiked Aminos any time during the day when you need a boost. As a training supplement, Animal Spiked Aminos can help before the workout (energy/focus), during the workout (performance/ergogenic), and even after the workout (recovery). Using Animal Spiked Aminos may help support optimal exercise performance, hydration and immune health.

  • Anabolic aminos (BCAA + EAA) “spiked” with energy, focus and clarity
  • “0” calories for maximum flexibility
  • Versatile–use it anytime you need a boost
  • Supports muscle growth, performance & recovery
  • Delicious flavor
short_description:
Animal Spiked Aminos 210 gms

Aminos any time during the day when you need a boost. Using Animal Spiked Aminos may help support optimal exercise performance, hydration and immune health.

name: Dymatize Super Amino 345 cap
description:
Dymatize Super Protein Amino 6000

Dymatize Super Protein Amino 6000 is a high-quality protein and amino acid complex which includes fast-absorbing whey protein isolate and whey protein concentrate combined with slower-absorbing casein.

Dymatize Super Protein Amino 6000 contains amino acids L-Arginine and L-Glutamine and a 2:1:1 ratio of BCAAs L-Leucine, L-Isoleucine, and L-Valine.
